snippet: The ruling on Monday cleared the way for the sprinter Dwain Chambers and the cyclist David Millar to seek spots for the London Games.
lead_paragraph: The ruling on Monday cleared the way for the sprinter Dwain Chambers and the cyclist David Millar to seek spots for the London Games.

headline.seo: Court Overturns Britain’s Lifetime Olympic Bans for Doping
headline.main: Court Overturns Britain’s Lifetime Olympic Bans
headline.print_headline: Court Overturns Britain’s Lifetime Olympic Bans
